SELECT DISTINCT `user`.* FROM `user` INNER JOIN user_organization ON `user`.id = user_organization.user_id WHERE FIND_IN_SET( user_organization.organization_id, getOrgChildren (#{orgId}) )
AND `user`.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{user.username},'%')
AND `user`.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{user.nickName},'%')
AND user_organization.is_delete = 0 AND `user`.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY `user`.id
